meanings.definition: A knife with a folding blade.
meanings.sent1: My dad always carries a jackknife when we go camping.
meanings.sent2: The hunter used a jackknife to skin the deer.
meanings.sent3: The old man proudly showed off his rusty jackknife collection.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp as a jackknife.
meanings.sent5: The shiny jackknife gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A dive in which the diver bends in midair to form a V shape.
meanings.sent1: The Olympic diver executed a perfect jackknife off the high platform.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her jackknife dive over and over to get it just right.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy diver attempted a jackknife but ended up belly flopping instead.
meanings.sent4: The bird swooped down in a graceful jackknife motion.
meanings.sent5: The synchronized swimmers performed a stunning jackknife routine.

meanings.definition: To fold or bend in a V shape.
meanings.sent1: I had to jackknife the paper to fit it into the envelope.
meanings.sent2: She carefully jackknifed the letter before sealing it.
meanings.sent3: The magician seemed to jackknife his body in impossible ways.
meanings.sent4: The road ahead jackknifed sharply, making it hard to see around the bend.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's body jackknifed as she executed a perfect flip.
